title: Maximum discipline for selected player offenses in the NFL 2011/2012
summary: This bar chart has 9 categories for the x axis representing Fine Types, and a y axis representing Maximum fine (in U.S. dollars).
The highest category is found at Unexcused_late_reporting_foror_absence_from_preseason_training where Maximum fine (in U.S. dollars) is 30000.0.
The lowest category is found at Being_overweight_(per_lb.) where Maximum fine (in U.S. dollars) is 470.0.

data.Fine Types: Unexcused late reporting foror absence from preseason training
Loss of playbook scouting reportor game plan
